# url plugin


```````````````````````````````` example
visit https://lepture.com/
.
<p>visit <a href="https://lepture.com/">https://lepture.com/</a></p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
visit [https://lepture.com/](/foo)
.
<p>visit <a href="/foo">https://lepture.com/</a></p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
visit <a href="/foo">https://lepture.com/</a>
.
<p>visit <a href="/foo">https://lepture.com/</a></p>
````````````````````````````````
